column1: Ozoir-la-Ferrière is a commune in the Seine-et-Marne department in the Île-de-France region in north-central France. It is located in the urban area of Paris 25.6 km (15.9 mi) east-southeast from the center.
Inhabitants are called Ozoiriens or Ozophoriciens.
Ozoir-la-Ferrière is served by Ozoir-la-Ferrière station on Paris RER line .
Ozoir-la-Ferrière is twinned with the town of Swords
